attributes.action: Make it illegal for job advertisements to omit salary and benefits.
attributes.additional_details: It will stop applicants time being wasted on applying for a job for less money and may stop companies from treating new hires differently.
attributes.background:
The gender pay gap is a big, and unnecessary, issue

In the interest of consistency, equality and fairness making it mandatory to enumerate salary and benefits on any job advertisement

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make it a legal requirement to list an expected salary on job advertisements.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572621
